column1: #Text=Lin says : " Air Temple Island is the ideal location for your base of operations and you 'll be safe here . "
#Text=Korra says : " There 's something we need to discuss with you . "
#Text=Korra says : " The four of us have been talking and ... we wan na take out Kuvira 's spirit weapon before it gets too close to the city . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " That sounds like a risk we do n't need to take .
#Text=" Mako says : " We ca n't let it get to our doorstep .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 'll sneak behind enemy lines and disable the weapon .
#Text=" Asami says : " If it works , it 'll even the playing field .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " But if you get caught ... " Korra says : " It 's worth the risk .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I agree , and it might be our only shot at preventing an all - out war .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 'll head out tonight .
